evidence.source_document: Class Action Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs ask this court to enjoin defendants from taking law enforcement action against plaintiffs for sleeping or simply existing in Grants Pass unless and until the City provides a lawful place for people to rest, sleep and find shelter.
